column2: Hi, We are having an opening for Manager IT, Project Lead-Implementation & Support at our Gurgaon location. Position: Manager IT Location: Gurgaon Company: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.   Job Summary  :   Working as a Project Lead IT with extensive experience in managing IT projects in life science domain. Managing, implementing projects in different verticals of pharma domain and actively involved in computer system validation activities. Management and implementation of IT      Projects within the constraints of scope, quality, time, and cost.      Delivering systems as per agreed requirements and meet customer      satisfaction. Compliance of the system with Regulatory guidelines and      applicable SOPs. Project Management- IT Applications       Interface between business users and external IT vendors, Stakeholder      management,  Business Analysis -Understanding      Business Requirements, facilitating process improvements and suggesting      solutions. SOW discussion with vendors, System development      support, System Implementation and Validation as per applicable policies      along with tracking of project timelines. Agreement formalization with vendors as      per requirement and providing day to day support to the Business users. Project budget management and ensuring      the project is delivered within scope, quality and cost. Business continuity of live applications by providing support.    Areas Of Responsibility: 1. Manage projects within the   constraints of scope, quality, time, and cost, to deliver specified   requirements and meet customer satisfaction 2. Project Management for   Application Software, preparing business cases, working on project   estimation, project plan, resource management, reviews & execution of the   project. 3. Ensure smooth functioning of   applications, coordinate with IT infra and ensure IT Infrastructure for   applications leading to organization productivity. 4. Interact and effectively   communicate with functional heads ensuring alignment of IT to organizational   goals 5. Effectively communicates IT   information / challenges to management, colleagues and cross functional   stakeholders ensuring better acceptance of IT point of view and policies. 6. Handling of issues and conflict   resolution. 7. Manage the deployment,   monitoring, maintenance, development, upgrade, and support of IT   applications.  8. Manage finances related to IT   Applications, like purchasing, budgeting and budget review. Reduce   expenditures. 9. Help and groom team members to   help them achieve their goals. 10. Business Analysis which   includes requirements gathering and business process mapping, analysis and   improvement/reengineering. Participation in analysis of business processes   and user requirements in order to get the solution development through   external Vendors/ procurement of software solutions available in market or   maintenance and enhancement as per Business requirements. As-is business   process mapping and proposing To-be business process through facilitation   exercise with business stakeholders. 11. Technical knowledge and   understanding of solutions implemented. Troubleshooting bugs and issues for   the solutions. Also interfacing with internal IT teams and vendors for issue   resolution. 12. Project Monitoring &   Execution. Creates and maintains project schedules, effort estimation,   establishing timelines, create and review validation documents, monitoring   milestone completion as per requirement, Project status reporting to senior   management, etc. 13. Monitors project cost and   ensure project completion within allocated budget 14. Manage project dependencies   & client expectations for the successful delivery of the project 15. Responsible for implementing   validation strategy and creating/getting created required deliverables for   solutions implemented. Has knowledge of applicable computer system validation   regulations. 16. Work to ensure that project   deadlines are met as agreed with the stakeholders 17. Interact with vendors and Plan   activities of the consultant /vendor, track their effort and cost. 18. Maintain and monitor   application licenses ensuring license compliance 19. Responsible for managing application   support. Interface between software vendor and user for problem resolution.   Support management of business applications implemented to meet the agreed   Service Level Agreement. 20. Escalate critical problems/   issues to the manager, management of issues impacting project deadlines and   company resources  21. Provide support for various   Regulatory audits. 22. Provide support regarding preparation and maintenance of R&D IT   budget.   Educational Qualification  :   Bachelors of Engineering (Computer Science)/ Bachelors or Masters in Pharma/Science Domain/IT/ Engineering with relevant Project management, Business analysis, project execution and leading experience.  Pharma domain IT experience preferred specially R&D, Clinical and Regulatory IT.    Specific Certification  :  Project Management and CSV PMP Certification is added advantage.    Experience:  Minimum 5 to 7 year experience. At least 3 years of experience in IT Project management of medium to big enterprise projects. Pharma domain experience is preferred.   Skill (Functional & Behavioural): Project Management  - (Knowledge and Proficiency in project management methodologies, Schedule /Cost/ Scope management of project, Ability to manage small/big, simple/Complex projects, Risk Management, Organization and Planning Skills, Resource Planning, Reporting and Status updates) Technical Knowledge  - Understanding and fair knowledge of IT concepts and SDLC, Programming, Databases, IT Infrastructure, Application configurations and technology, good knowledge of project implementation methodologies like Waterfall, Agile etc. Business Analysis CSV (Computer System Validation) and Project documentation IT project implementation end to end Team and Stakeholder management

column2: As a ServiceNow Architect specializing in ITSM and ITOM, you will be instrumental in shaping our IT service delivery capabilities and optimizing our IT operations using the ServiceNow platform.      You will work closely with cross-functional teams to design and implement robust, scalable, and efficient solutions.     Key Responsibilities:     Solution Design: Lead the design and architecture of ServiceNow solutions for ITSM and ITOM, aligning with industry best practices and business needs.     Custom Development: Oversee the development of custom applications, modules, and workflows within the ServiceNow platform to support IT service delivery and operations.     Integration Management: Architect and manage complex integrations between ServiceNow and various IT systems, including configuration management databases (CMDBs), monitoring tools, and other ITOM components.     Platform Governance: Establish and enforce governance policies, security standards, and best practices for the ServiceNow environment, ensuring compliance with ITIL and ITSM frameworks.     Performance Optimization: Continuously assess and optimize the performance, scalability, and reliability of ServiceNow in the ITSM and ITOM domains.     Project Leadership: Lead and manage ServiceNow implementation projects, collaborating with stakeholders, conducting workshops, and ensuring successful project delivery.     Technical Leadership: Provide technical leadership and mentoring to ServiceNow development teams, driving the adoption of best practices and architectural guidelines.     Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of platform architecture, configurations, and integration strategies.     Vendor Collaboration: Maintain relationships with ServiceNow vendors and stay updated on platform updates, new features, and emerging technologies.     Training and Knowledge Sharing: Conduct training sessions and workshops for IT teams and stakeholders on ServiceNow ITSM and ITOM capabilities.     Qualifications:     Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).     Proven experience as a ServiceNow Architect with a focus on ITSM and ITOM, with at least [X] years of hands-on experience.     ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD), Certified Implementation Specialist (CIS), or Certified System Administrator (CSA) certifications are required. Certified Application Architect (CAA) or Certified System Architect (CSA) is a plus.     Strong knowledge of ITSM and ITOM processes, ITIL best practices, and ServiceNow platform capabilities.     Expertise in ServiceNow development, scripting (JavaScript), and custom application design.     Extensive experience with integration methods, including REST, SOAP, and MID Server.     Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills.     Strong communication and leadership abilities.     Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

column2: Nisum is a leading global digital commerce firm headquartered in California,  with services spanning digital strategy and transformation,  insights and analytics,  blockchain,  business agility,  and custom software development.  Founded in 2000 with the customer-centric motto     Building Success Together     ,   Nisum has grown to over 1, 800 professionals across the United States,  Chile, Colombia,  India,  Pakistan and Canada.  A preferred advisor to leading Fortune 500 brands,  Nisum enables clients to achieve direct business growth by building the advanced technology they need to reach end customers in today s world,  with immersive and seamless experiences across digital and physical channels.          What You'll Do       Driving scrum teams and their cadence -  daily stand ups,  backlog grooming/prioritisation,  open/close,  retrospection.     Showcasing and discussing the health of the projects with client managers using burn up/burn down charts.     Coordinating with release management teams for release planning and dependencies.     Managing team dependencies with external teams    Budget and cost management analysis at program level and sprint level.     Tracks and ensures visibility of historical team metrics and progress of the iteration and release.     Emphasises the need for incremental releases,  iterative work and prioritisation by value and risk.      Assists with internal and external communication by transparently radiating information.      Proactively identifies and removes blockers,  limits work in progress and prevents distractions.      Facilitates frequent retrospectives,  sharing metrics to identify and implement improvements.                 What You Know       A minimum of 10+ years of proven professional experience is required.      Proven experience in project management and software development.     Good working knowledge of project estimation techniques.     Excellent technical knowledge.     Good leadership,  decision-making,  and organization skills.     Strong attention to detail and multi-tasking skills.     Identifies,  creates and defends opportunities for expediting feedback throughout the iteration.     Participates proactively in developing and maintaining team standards,  tools,  and best practices.     Creating a project budget and ensuring the project adheres to the budget as closely as possible.     Tracking milestones,  deliverables,  and change requests.     Serving as a liaison to communicate information regarding changes,  milestones reached,  and other pertinent information.     Delivering completed software products to clients and performing regular checks on the products' performance.     Should have a strong technical working experience     Very good proven experience on project estimations               Education       A bachelor's degree in information technology,  software development management,  software engineering,  computer science,  or a related field.                Benefits       In addition to competitive salaries and benefits packages,  Nisum India offers its employees some unique and fun extras:      Continuous Learning -   Year-round training sessions are offered as part of skill enhancement certifications sponsored by the company on a need basis.  We support our team to excel in their field.       Parental Medical Insurance   - Nisum believes our team is the heart of our business and we want to make sure to take care of the heart of theirs.  We offer opt-in parental medical insurance in addition to our medical benefits.       Activities -  From the Nisum Premier League's cricket tournaments to hosted Hack-a-thon,  Nisum employees can participate in a variety of team-building activities such as skits,  and dances performance in addition to festival celebrations.       Free Meals -   Free snacks and dinner is provided on a daily basis,  in addition to subsidized lunch.                 Nisum is an Equal Opportunity Employer and we are proud of our ongoing efforts to foster diversity and inclusion in the workplace.

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and analytical HR Business Analyst/Project Manager to join our team. The HR Business Analyst will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision-making processes within the Human Resources department. The ideal candidate will possess a blend of analytical skills, business acumen, and HR knowledge to provide insights and recommendations that optimize HR strategies and initiatives. This role will involve analyzing HR metrics, identifying trends, developing reports, and collaborating with various stakeholders to enhance organizational effectiveness and employee experience. The ideal candidate will possess strong project management skills, a deep understanding of HR practices, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives               Key Job Responsibilities        Collect, analyze, and interpret HR data from various sources such as HRIS, performance evaluations, recruitment metrics, employee surveys, etc.     Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of HR projects from initiation to completion, ensuring adherence to project scope, timelines, and budget.     Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and presentations to communicate key HR metrics and insights to stakeholders.     Identify trends, patterns, and correlations in HR data to provide actionable recommendations for HR strategies and decision-making.     Partner with HR leaders to evaluate existing HR processes and systems to identify opportunities for optimization and efficiency improvements.     Recommend and implement enhancements to HR processes, workflows, and systems to streamline operations and improve user experience.     Coordinate project activities, tasks, and dependencies across cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and priorities.     Engage and collaborate with key stakeholders, including HR leadership, department heads, project sponsors, and external vendors, to define project requirements and expectations.     Communicate project status updates, progress reports, and risk assessments to stakeholders, addressing concerns and soliciting feedback as needed.     Create and deliver clear and effective communication plans to disseminate project information, updates, and training materials to relevant stakeholders and impacted employees.     Monitor project performance metrics, KPIs, and success criteria to evaluate project outcomes and identify opportunities for improvement.     Develop and implement change management strategies to facilitate smooth transitions and adoption of HR initiatives within the organization.     Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, internal policies, and industry standards throughout the project lifecycle.                Knowledge, Skills & Qualifications        Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Data Analytics, Project Management or related field. Master's degree preferred.     Proven experience (3-5 years) as a Business Analyst, Data Analyst, project management or similar role, preferably within the HR domain.     Experience with HRIS platforms (e.g., Workday, SAP SuccessFactors) is a plus.     Proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques, such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, etc.     Proficiency in project management tools and software (e.g., Microsoft Project, Asana, JIRA).     Strong understanding of HR processes, practices, and compliance requirements.     Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights and recommendations.     Ability to work collaboratively across functions and influence stakeholders at various levels of the organization.     Strong attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and a proactive mindset.

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and talented Technical Project Coordinator with a strong background in project management, technical background and proficiency in CRM tools such as Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, etc. The ideal candidate should be adaptable, possess excellent communication skills, and demonstrate the ability to coordinate and manage projects efficiently. The Technical Project Manager will be responsible to be hands on and manage teams consisting of onsite and offshore blended resources in the development of multiple business driven solutions. The candidate should be a problem solver, have strong networking skills, and preferably hold certifications in project management. Roles and Responsibilities:   Project Management: Coordinate and manage projects from initiation to completion, ensuring timely delivery and meeting client expectations.   CRM Expertise: Proficient in using CRM platforms like Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, etc., to maintain client information, track project progress, and enhance customer relationships.   Business Strategist: Plan and Manage Projects aligning business goals with technology solutions to drive process improvements and competitive advantage. Understand business requirements and oversees the functional/business requirements of the client.   Continuous Learning: Display a proactive attitude towards learning and adapting to new tools, technologies, and industry trends.   Team Management: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, providing leadership and support to achieve project milestones.  T ime Management: Efficiently manage project timelines, ensuring tasks are completed within specified deadlines.   Project Management Methodologies and Tools: Expert in PM Methodlogies like Agile, Scrum, Waterfall models. Should have good hands-on experience on PM tools like JIRA, Trello, Asana or any other PM tool.   Documentation: Maintain accurate and comprehensive project documentation, including Project plans, Project Schedules, Gantt charts, Status reports, and client communications in the form of MoM.   Flexible Working Shifts: Adapt to flexible working hours, including shifts, to accommodate project requirements and time zone differences for overseas clients.   Communication Skills: Possess excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal, ensuring clear and concise interactions with team members and clients.   Team Player and Problem Solver: Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, promoting effective communication and knowledge sharing. Identify and resolve project-related challenges promptly, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.   Project Management Certification (Optional): Any certification in project management (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2, SAFe or any other relevant certification) is a plus. Qualifications:  Bachelor's and/or Master's degree in Technology, Business, Project Management, or a related field.  Proven experience in project coordination or similar roles.  Familiarity with various CRM tools.  Strong interpersonal and leadership skills. If you meet the criteria outlined above and are excited about contributing to dynamic projects in a fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply.

column2: FED work streams are divided into three primary areas.          Research and Strategy:    Deep dive into identified sectors, speak to relevant stakeholders, study practices from other countries and build data backed evidence for change.            Communication and Outreach:    Build salience for opportunity in target sectors and need for reforms through op-eds in relevant channels, social media as well as one on one engagement with key bureaucrats and policymakers.            Implementation Support:    Work with select state governments in helping implement specific actions to promote the target sectors. The team is currently working closely with the UP Government on its Mission Trillion Dollar economy. The team is also working with Telangana and Tamil Nadu governments on their economic growth agenda.          Position Summary          We are looking to hire an exceptional Project Lead to join the team in an exciting time of organizational growth and development      The SPL will work on creating actionable plans, sharpening priorities, and ensuring delivery of high-quality outputs in a timely manner      The role will involve undertaking research and scoping exercises, establishing, and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders, creating organizational growth and strategy plans, and ensuring that the organization has the strategic support necessary to achieve its goals      Overall, the PL will provide project design and execution support, aligned with the missions, goals and targets of FED      This is a high-energy, entrepreneurial role and a great opportunity for those who enjoy working in a start-up environment and care deeply about economic growth and the impact sector      This role includes working with senior stakeholders and engaging with them on strategic projects that have the potential to solve key challenges of economic development in India      The FED team works with internal and external stakeholders on cross functional projects      The PL should have demonstrated capabilities in project, team and stakeholder management, as well as excellent oral & written communication skills      The ideal candidate is a self-starter with a bias towards action and the ability to work with ambiguous requirements          Key Responsibilities          Work with the leadership to execute work plans, with the aim of achieving the agreed targets and goals, in line with the budget.          Stakeholder mapping/ providing inputs into advocacy plans.          Work closely with the leadership team on creating and maintaining deep engagement with the government and private sector leaders.          Take on diverse operational tasks to ensure organizational success.          Prepare structured documents and other collaterals (including presentations, excel sheets etc.) as per the requirements for the project.          Prepare progress reports from time-to-time for internal and external reviews.          Project manage and coordinate with stakeholders concerned with various projects.          Analyze publicly available data/ information and provide relevant insights.          Required Qualifications, Skills, and Abilities:          Masters or equivalent degree, preferably in Economics, Public Policy, Business Administration, or Public Administration from a top tier institution.          6-10 years of experience; with at least two years in a managing project teams.          Exceptional analytic and technical skills.          High attention to detail, accuracy, protocol, and deadline.          Highly analytical thinker with sound business judgment.          Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder-facing skills including solid presentation and facilitation skills.          High level of flexibility and responsiveness with the ability to shift priorities quickly and as organizational demands require.          Proven self-starter (comfortable with what could be a remote team) with demonstrated problem solving and organizational skills.

column2: Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced CRM Manager to oversee the planning, execution of customer relationship management (CRM) projects within our organization. The CRM Manager will be responsible to improve CRM and business operations. Key Responsibilities: Team Leadership:  Assemble and lead a cross-functional project team.  Delegate tasks and responsibilities to team members.  Motivate and manage project team members to achieve project objectives. Requirements Analysis:  Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and document CRM system requirements.  Analyze existing CRM processes and identify areas for improvement.  Ensure that the CRM solution aligns with the organization's goals and objectives.  Manage project risks and issues, implementing mitigation strategies. Quality Assurance:  Ensure that the CRM system meets quality standards and user requirements.  Conduct thorough testing and validation of the CRM solution.  Implement best practices and industry standards in CRM implementation. Change Management:  Develop and implement a change management plan to ensure smooth adoption of the CRM system by end-users.  Provide training and support to users to maximize CRM utilization. Reporting and Documentation:  Generate regular progress reports for project stakeholders.  Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, requirements, and change logs. Implementation Evaluation:  Assess the effectiveness of the CRM solution after implementation.  Gather feedback from users and stakeholders to identify areas for improvement.  Make recommendations for ongoing enhancements and optimizations. Qualifications:  Proven experience as a CRM Project Manager or in a similar project management role.  Strong understanding of CRM systems and their implementation.  Project management certification (e.g., PMP) is a plus.  Experience in Microsoft Dynamics CRM will be a plus.  Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.  Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.  Proficiency in project management software and tools.  Knowledge of CRM best practices and industry trends. The CRM Manager plays a critical role in driving customer-centric initiatives and improving the overall customer experience. If you are a results-oriented, organized, and strategic thinker with a passion for CRM, we encourage you to apply for this position and help us transform our customer relationships.

column2: Summary:  We are seeking a dynamic Project Lead to oversee and manage projects from initiation through implementation, ensuring adherence to scope, budget, and timeline. The ideal candidate will possess strong leadership skills, exceptional communication abilities, and a proven track record of successful project delivery. This role requires a blend of project management expertise and business analysis acumen to effectively coordinate with various stakeholders and ensure project success.  Key Responsibilities:   Manage projects with top-down oversight, ensuring adherence to standards of scope, budget, and timeline.  Develop comprehensive project plans integrating customer requirements and coordinating with Business Analysts and technical personnel throughout all project phases.  Prepare Project Management Plans and oversee overall project requirements.  Review proposed modifications on project plans and implement beneficial changes after consultation with the concerned team.  Assess and address technical risks, proactively raising flags and executing mitigation action plans.  Implement governance framework for projects, including scoping, planning, and deployment.  Facilitate the creation and maintenance of proper project documentation, including BRD, FRD, and operations handover documents.  Plan and schedule project activities, conduct sprint meetings, and ensure sprint goals are met.  Collaborate effectively with internal teams including BA/PMOs, developers, architects, and operations.  Collaborate closely with DevOps teams to integrate continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines into project workflows, ensuring seamless deployment and release management throughout all project phases.  Ensure clear understanding of requirements and alignment with implementation plans.  Communicate with customers to manage expectations effectively.  Monitor and control project progress daily, reporting status to stakeholders.  Required Skills:   5-8 years of related experience in project management and business analysis.  Extensive leadership experience with strong teaming abilities.  Proficiency in DevOps tools and methodologies, including experience with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, automation frameworks, and infrastructure as code (IaC) practices.  Excellent problem-solving skills.  Strong verbal and written communication skills.  Self-starter, independent, proactive, and adept at driving teams and projects.  Proficiency in MS Office.  Knowledge of project management tools would be an added advantage.  Preferred Skills:   Familiarity with project management methodologies and tools.  Prior experience in managing client interactions and ensuring customer satisfaction.  Ability to manage project engagements from planning to implementation, ensuring timely delivery and meeting deadlines.  If you are a proactive and experienced Project Lead with a passion for delivering high-quality solutions and driving project success, we invite you to join our team
column11: Client Management, Project Management, Business Analysis, Team Management, Documentation

column2: Role Overview   The Technical Project Lead will play a pivotal role in driving our team of talented software engineers to new achievements.  This position demands an inspiring leader with a blend of technical prowess and excellent management skills to oversee the development of high-profile web and mobile applications. You will lead your project team technically and interpersonally: from the initial definition of the most worthwhile tasks to pursue, through technical grooming, oversight, and troubleshooting.  You will coach and guide your team to help them excel and grow. Key Responsibilities Lead a multi-disciplinary team of front-end, back-end, UI developers, and QA engineers toward successful project deliverables. Set clear project objectives and refine project plans in collaboration with project managers. Schedule and assign tasks, ensuring appropriate workload distribution and role alignment. Offer ongoing guidance, mentorship, and support to the team, fostering a collaborative and productive environment. Optimize application performance, maintaining a balance between quality and efficiency. Requirements At least 5 years of software development and subsequent project management experience with a track record of leading a team of 5-10 software engineers. Strong technical foundation in building and supporting scalable, reusable software. Proficiency in Agile (Scrum) methodologies and a solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Outstanding communication skills, both written and verbal. You have demonstrated the ability to manage organizational priorities and workflow. Preferred Qualifications Bachelors or masters degree in computer science or a related field. Certification in Project Management practices is preferred though not mandatory. What You Will Do Collaborate with key stakeholders to set team goals and expectations. Conduct technical grooming of user stories into short, actionable tasks. Estimate task durations and identify dependencies, ensuring efficient task execution. Allocate tasks based on team member skills, promoting effective team utilization. Lead sprint planning and participate in all phases of the project lifecycle. Monitor development, proactively identify and navigating problems, and estimate changes as they arise to avoid inefficiency or delay Troubleshoot engineers??technical issues directly and by involving appropriate specialists. Champion creativity and empowerment within the team, resolving conflicts and nurturing collaboration. Generate weekly status reports for stakeholders, ensuring transparency and accountability. Develop, document, enforce, and monitor adherence to software development standards. What We Offer A competitive salary and benefits package. A culture of empowerment, collaboration, and personal growth. Opportunities to work on exciting projects with cutting-edge technologies.
column11: Technical Management, Team Handling, Solution Architecting

column2: A                           s a Project Delivery Lead at LotusFlare, you will lead the day to day execution of a client project while building a trusted relationship with the client. You will lead the project team consisting of LotusFlare and client team members and guide them towards project execution and achieving overall project goals. You ll work directly with clients and you ll take ownership of the overall project and its deliverables.                                You will have the opportunity to build on your proven leadership skills and leverage your interest in inspiring others, building strong relationships, and making a demonstrable impact. In a collaborative team setting, youll work closely with other functions and delivery team members but also autonomously with little direction. Your superior analytical, quantitative and conceptual thinking skills and strong interpersonal and communication skills will ensure successful client projects and team performance.                                  You would have a deeper understanding of LotusFlare s Digital platform. The client delivery typically includes gathering and analyzing information, formulating and testing hypotheses, and developing recommendations incorporating LotusFlare s digital platform and services. From there, you will implement those recommendations with client team members.                                 In this role you must have a technical background, time management, organization and have excellent problem solving skills. You must have a good understanding of project management fundamentals and must be comfortable communicating with senior leadership verbally and in writing within LotusFlare and also the assigned accounts. We ask for a lot, but we also offer a lot!                         RESPONSIBILITIES                           Responsible to lead, update, coordinate, plan and program manage project(s).                                 Own the project plan covering all workstreams, delivery dates, milestones, inter-dependencies, gates, squads, sprints, chapters, etc.                                  Operate as the lead point of contact for any and all matters specific to your account(s).                                 Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships.                                 Own and update the project risk management matrix.                                  Drive project execution technical track; track delivery, take ownership of change management, proactively seek and resolve blockers by working closely internally with product and engineering teams and externally with customer                                 Understand LotusFlare s Digital platform, system architecture and integration components and manage production releases, and project handover to our support and operational teams.                                 Act as a key interface between the customer and the LotusFlare organization including product, engineering, support and business.                                 Secure client sign off on certificates of acceptance, coordinate with LotusFlare finance on invoice generation and collections                                 Executive presence and excellent written and verbal communications skills. column2: Job Title:       Project Coordinator         Experience Level:       5 years         Job Location:        Gurgaon         Detailed JD:           Job Description:         The primary roles of this position are twofold: to act as the "technical advocate" for the business and act as the primary intermediary between the business and the technology delivery team. By applying expertise in technology, business processes and general business knowledge, will promote a culture of superior client service and flawless project delivery. This role will serve as primary lead for coordinating discovery, scope, estimates and business case development for new engagements.          Additionally, the role will provide technical expertise and leadership to a team dedicated to hardware/software/network technologies design and build activities (may be comprised of internal and/or vendor/contractor resources) in a project management role. Ensure activities are completed, validated, align with architectural objectives and requirements, and successfully deploy into the production environment. Provide mentorship to team ensuring optimization of designs/solutions. Create, document and manage processes and procedures that govern Engineering and Operations. Deliver successful project outcomes. Manage and complete all support documentation on assigned projects, including creating and updating all technical procedures/manuals, operational support documentation and archival of all related project documentation.         Establish and maintain effective working relationships with technology teams and business partners at management and end user levels.          Leverage existing or new tools and create repeatable processes and procedures to satisfy Security, Risk and Compliance requirements for the Global Network Services practice as well as authoring Engineering and Operational processes.         Execute procedures in compliance with processes to maintain compliance with documented requirements.         Leverage Technical Control Framework to ensure Global Network Services practices deliver the necessary controls to consistently and systematically meet requirements.         Interface with Global Network Services' primary suppliers to ensure successful integration with the Technical Control Framework's processes and procedures.         Ensure processes and procedure documentation for Engineering and Operations in the documentation repository is current and consistent.         ",

column2: We are looking for a highly skilled and dynamic Project Lead with expertise in SEO (Search Engine Optimization), digital marketing, and programming. This role requires a strong understanding of search engine algorithms, digital marketing principles, and programming languages.        The Project Lead will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project success and drive business growth.      Job Responsibilities      Lead and oversee projects from initiation to completion, ensuring adherence to project scope, timelines, and budgets. Develop project plans, allocate resources, track progress, and manage project risks. Maintain effective communication and collaboration with team members and stakeholders.          Develop and implement effective SEO strategies to improve    organic search rankings, increase website visibility, and drive targeted traffic.    Conduct keyword research, optimize website content, and analyze SEO performance metrics to make data-driven recommendations.          Plan, execute, and monitor digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including search engines, social media, email marketing, and display advertising. Optimize campaign performance, analyze data, and refine strategies to maximize ROI.          Utilize programming skills to develop and maintain websites, web applications, or other digital assets. Monitor project performance, track key metrics, and generate comprehensive reports. Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis to optimize project outcomes. Present project progress, results, and recommendations to management.          Stay abreast of the latest trends, technologies, and best practices. Proven experience as a project lead, demonstrating successful delivery of projects on time and within budget. Proficiency in programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and familiarity with web development frameworks.          Excellent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.          Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with a data-driven approach. column2: Is the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for the contracted Pharmacovigilance activities and assists Project Manager for project operation oversight.       Provide oversight and direction of all Pharmacovigilance services/ activities throughout the duration of a project (including deliverables and finances) as a Pharmacovigilance subject matter expert.     Primary liaison for client and project team for Pharmacovigilance services/activities (time, scope, cost, quality, resource) matters with oversight from the Project Manager.     Liaise with Project Manager, and other cross functional project resources, as appropriate.     Work with Project Manager to ensure accurate projections of units/hours (revenue and resources) and actual units/hours for all Pharmacovigilance services.     Assesses upcoming workload and coordinates with the Project Manager and Resource Managers for planning.     Provides monthly worked units for safety services and performs timely reconciliations to ensure correct life-to-date billing.     Actively identify and maintains out of scope log for Pharmacovigilance Services to resolution/report to Project Manager.     Represents Pharmacovigilance and related service updates on client and project team meetings / teleconferences.     Conducts regular team briefing meeting to ensure team understanding for the project requirements, key decisions and important updates.     Actively communicates with the client and represents Pharmacovigilance operations in teleconferences with the relevant stakeholders for the assigned projects.     Responsible to support Pharmacovigilance Project set-up.     Ensure up to date team training throughout lifecycle of the project.     Responsible to provide Pharmacovigilance Service input into the Project Management Plan throughout the lifecycle of the project. When assigned to a portfolio, ensures consistency of the PMP and safety documentation across all projects.     Oversee the development of project specific plans (i.e. Safety Management Plan)     Ensures delivery of high-quality Pharmacovigilance work by the project team with compliance to the agreed timelines.     Ensures adherence to company document filing standards and performs regular project file reviews to confirm inspection readiness.     Proactively identifies, resolves/mitigates through ongoing review of project progress and metrics and escalates risks and/or issues until resolution.     Conducts safety presentations for bid defense, start-up meetings, Investigator Meetings and other meetings as needed.     Provide guidance for any audit/inspection activities.     Monitor quality and compliance for safety deliverables and provides data metrics for inclusion in monthly project reports. Additionally assist management, as required with weekly and monthly project status reports.     Lead the coordination of any safety or medical information related activities.     Train/mentor newly hired Pharmacovigilance staff, on project specific task as requested.     Perform other activities as identified and requested by Pharmacovigilance management.

column2: We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Delivery Excellence Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the delivery of projects with excellence, adhering to timelines, budgets, and quality standards. They will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining program health dashboards, implementing governance processes, reviewing projects for quality assurance, tracking customer satisfaction, managing workflows, and monitoring risks throughout the project lifecycle.       Key Responsibilities:             Build and maintain program health dashboards to surface key metrics that can be utilized across various stakeholder communities.     Implement robust governance processes to ensure adherence to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards.     Review projects from quality aspects, ensuring quality assurance and process excellence throughout the project lifecycle.     Track customer satisfaction survey data and collaborate with relevant teams to address feedback and improve service delivery.     Monitor workflows related to delivery excellence, including project delivery, planning, and reporting, and identify areas for optimization. Job Description: We are seeking a talented and experienced Performance Test Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a  Performance Test Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the optimal performance and scalability of our  applications. You will be responsible for conducting load and volume testing, as well as identifying and mitigating  bottlenecks that may impact application performance. Proficiency in performance testing tools like JMeter,  LoadRunner, as well as experience with performance monitoring tools from AWS and Azure, will be essential for  this role.  Responsibilities:    Quality & Testing: Design and execute comprehensive automated test scenarios to assess  the application's behavior under different load conditions, including stress, load, and  volume testing. ??Test Planning: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the performance  requirements and create test plans that align with project objectives.   Test Environment Setup: Set up and configure test environments, ensuring they accurately  represent production-like scenarios to obtain realistic performance metrics.   Performance Metrics Analysis: Monitor and analyze performance metrics during test  execution using performance testing tools like JMeter, LoadRunner, as well as performance  monitoring tools from AWS (e.g., Amazon CloudWatch, AWS X-Ray) and Azure (e.g., Azure  Monitor, Application Insights). Identify any deviations from expected performance and  conduct root cause analysis.   Bottleneck Identification: Utilize profiling and monitoring tools from AWS and Azure to  identify performance bottlenecks, system resource constraints, and potential areas for  optimization.   Performance Tuning: Collaborate with developers and other stakeholders to suggest  performance improvements and work towards their implementation.  Performance Reporting: Generate detailed performance test reports, summarize findings, and provide actionable improvement recommendations. ??Automation: Continuously enhance performance testing methodologies and implement automation using tools like JMeter,and  LoadRunner, as well as AWS and Azure services to  streamline testing processes.  Scalability Testing: Evaluate the application's ability to scale with increasing user loads and  workloads.  Performance Best Practices: Stay up to date with industry best practices and emerging  trends in performance testing and monitoring, particularly related to AWS and Azure, to  ensure our applications meet or exceed performance standards.  Necessary Skills:  Should be strong in Python, Scripting and Selenium  Should be strong in SQL,/PLSQl/PGSQL.   Should have worked on Azure or AWS environment.   Should be familiar with one or more DB technologies such as SQLserver, Redshift,  Postgres, Snowflake, Databricks.  Qualification:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.  Required Experience:  Minimum 5+ years of relevant experience as a Performance Test Engineer.  Proven experience (X years) as a Performance Test Engineer or in a similar role, with a focus on load,  stress, and volume testing.  Strong proficiency in performance testing tools such as JMeter, LoadRunner, or Gatling.  Experience with performance monitoring tools from AWS (e.g., Amazon CloudWatch, AWS X-Ray) and  Azure (e.g., Azure Monitor, Application Insights).  Solid understanding of performance testing methodologies, concepts, and best practices. Knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Java, Python) to aid in performance scripting and automation is a plus.  Familiarity with web technologies, APIs, and databases to analyze application behavior.  Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail.  Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. ??Knowledge of Agile development methodologies is preferred.  Certifications in performance testing tools, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), and methodologies are a plus.

column2: To spearhead the design process through all project phases as per client needs and standard codes, were seeking a Structural Specialist to join our building team in India. With over 120 professionals in India together with our global team of experts, we work alongside our customers on the world s most prestigious building and industrial projects. Weve contributed to notable projects like Copenhagen airport - Terminal 3 Airside extension and LEGO Manufacturing Facility plant in US, Vietnam, and China , highlighting our commitment to excellence in buildings and addressing the growing demands of our international business. As a Specialist, you will report to the Head of Building Structures, in India.         Your responsibilities will be to:         Develop feasibility/concept studies, prepare project design basis, and detailed design of Structural Engineering services in buildings and industrial projects as per client requirement.         Lead the entire design process involved in all design phases of the project, as per client requirements and in accordance with standard codes.         Lead team of engineers in analysis, design, and detailing of (medium/large size) concrete and steel structures and support junior staff in their career development.         Prepare an activity-time-resource plan for a project, maintain a log of the estimated time to complete the project, maintain a document control plan for the design deliverables, and ensure all project KPIs are met while making the final delivery.         Lead a team of engineers with advanced technical accuracy, monitor the delegated task, track the deadlines, identify the potential risk in design, and flag additional resource requirements to the Discipline Lead.         Do project coordination across disciplines and offer sustainable solutions on the interface comments/issues.         Review and certify the design deliverables made to counterpart.         Lead the internal meetings with counterpart discipline lead/PM, update the project progress, explain, and agree on major design decisions & disseminate information within the team.         Your skills. Our team. Together we design the future.       The first step to success in this role is that you are eager to collaborate with the people around you, whether they are colleagues, internal/external partners, or customers. Developing ties with others is something you do by acting respectfully and delivering on your promises. And you never get set in your ways but keep exploring new insights and ways to improve.     Moreover, you will have:        Masters in Structural Engineering from a recognized Institute with a minimum of 10 years of experience in the design of RCC, steel and precast, and composite structures. Experience from an international engineering consultant firm will be an added advantage.         Proficiency in technical structural software like ROBOT/FEM design, ETABS, and SAFE. Knowledge of REVIT Structure and Navisworks will be preferred, but not essential.         Knowledge of International Codes related to Structural Engineering - EURO(EN), BS.EN, ACI, AISE Standards.         Proven track record of technical delivery of challenging structural engineering design projects both within the team and under own initiative         Good, project management skills with strong communication and willingness to learn new advancements in the design industry.         A sound understanding of Microsoft Outlook, Word, and Excel is essential.

column2: As a Project Management Office (PMO) Manager, you will play a critical role in overseeing and managing the project management function within our organization. You will be responsible for maintaining/deriving data (Utilization, Forecasting, SOW review and renewal, Presto, Estimation and Account Planning) and create appropriate reports for the same. The PMO Manager will develop and implement project management methodologies, processes, and best practices to optimize project performance and ensure alignment with organizational goals.         Responsibilities:           Strategic Planning:    Develop and implement the PMO strategy aligned with the organizations objectives and goals. Define the PMOs mission, vision, and goals to guide project management activities.       Project Portfolio Management:    Should be proficient in handling SOW, Utilization metrics, Forecasting and Account planning.    Conduct regular portfolio reviews to assess project health and make data-driven decisions.         Methodology Development:    Establish and maintain project management methodologies, processes, standards, and tools to support efficient and effective project delivery. Continuously review and improve project management practices to ensure alignment with industry best practices.       Project Governance:    Define project governance frameworks, policies, and procedures to ensure compliance with organizational standards and regulatory requirements. Establish project review and approval processes to monitor project progress and mitigate risks.       Resource Management:    Oversee resource allocation and capacity planning to ensure optimal utilization of resources across projects. Collaborate with project managers to identify resource requirements and allocate resources accordingly.       Risk Management:    Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks and issues to minimize potential impacts on project delivery. Develop risk management strategies and contingency plans to address identified risks.       Stakeholder Management:    Establish and maintain effective communication channels with stakeholders to ensure alignment of project objectives and expectations. Manage stakeholder relationships and address stakeholder concerns in a timely manner.       Quality Management:    Define quality standards and metrics to measure and monitor project performance. Implement quality assurance processes and conduct project reviews to ensure compliance with quality standards.       Reporting and Analysis:    Prepare and present regular reports on project status, progress, and performance to senior management and stakeholders. Conduct data analysis to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for improvement.         Requirements:         Bachelors degree in business administration, project management, or a related field.     Well versed with Microsoft excel and all microsoft tools     Proven experience in project management, with at least 5 to 6 years of experience in a leadership role within a PMO.     Strong understanding of project management methodologies, processes, and best practices.     Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.     Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.     Proficiency in project management tools and software.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.     Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

column2: Project Role : Scrum Master Project Role Description : Acts as an enabler for the effective functioning of a software development team using Agile methodologies. Coaches and mentors the Scrum Team(s), removing barriers to successful implementation and enabling a continued focus on the task at hand. Facilitates scrum and agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Identifies and reports progress via appropriate metrics.  Must have skills : Scrum Good to have skills : Microsoft Sharepoint Administration Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Minimum 15 years of full time education  Summary :As a Scrum Master, you will be responsible for enabling the effective functioning of a software development team using Agile methodologies. Your typical day will involve coaching and mentoring the Scrum Team(s), facilitating scrum and agile ceremonies, and identifying and reporting progress via appropriate metrics.  Roles & Responsibilities: Implement Project Management/Best Practices Keep all Parties on Track and Informed Introduce Agile Engineering Practices Coach Team Members Host Daily Stand-up Meetings Teach Scrum Practices and Principles Coach and mentor the Scrum Team(s), removing barriers to successful implementation and enabling a continued focus on the task at hand. Facilitate scrum and agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Identify and report progress via appropriate metrics, ensuring that the team is meeting its goals and objectives. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product owners, developers, and quality assurance, to ensure that the team is delivering high-quality software on time and within budget. Continuously improve the team's processes and practices, leveraging Agile methodologies and best practices to drive efficiency and effectiveness. Professional & Technical Skills: A Scrum Master demands a wide range of technical skills.  A successful Scrum Master must possess a strong understanding of Agile principles and the Scrum framework, proficiency in project management tools and software, knowledge of software development principles, problem-solving and analytical abilities, exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, and a commitment to continuous learning.  By acquiring and honing these technical skills, a Scrum Master can effectively guide and empower teams to achieve project success in an Agile environment. Must To Have Skills:Strong understanding of Scrum methodologies and Agile principles. Good To Have Skills:Experience with Agile project management tools such as JIRA or Trello. Effective communication, proficient team management, and engaging team building activities. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Proven track record of successfully leading Agile software development teams, with a minimum of 5 years of experience as a Scrum Master. Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills, with the ability to identify and address issues in a timely and effective manner. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Scrum methodologies and Agile principles. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, engineering, or a related field. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification Minimum 15 years of full time education

column2: The major role of the BRM is to      Provide leadership, liaison, and continuity and be the bridge between IT and Business Units.                 This role will require working closely with the MEIC team as well as the global and IT organizations. This role will require a strong communicator who has a solid understanding and experience in R&D, Change-management, and Building /Supporting IT Infrastructure projects for all BU s.                 A Day in the Life                       IT Business Relationship Manager (IT BRM) will provide leadership, liaison, and continuity and be the bridge between IT and Business Units (BUs).                      IT BRM will be the First Line Manager and manage team of Regional Business Interfaces with assigned portfolios, accounts, and BUs. IT BRM will be based in Hyderabad and reporting to IT Leader India. He/She will also provide IT Operations Management support and perform other management duties as assigned.                          IT BRM will be highly experienced and skilled, technically sound with more than 8 years of IT industry experience with at least three years in leading professional teams                      IT BRM, will work closely with stake holders to identify, recommend, develop, implement, and support cost-effective technology solutions for the BUs                      IT BRM will have both; an external focus to timely and successfully deliver IT solutions to and an internal focus to coordinate with IT to ensure that products, services and technologies properly integrate together.                          IT BRM must possess a strong understanding and experience in deploying diverse IT technologies                      IT BRM should have demonstrated performance of quick learning and understanding defined processes of IT and BUs and enhanced partnering with BUs                          IT BRM will also oversee the Product Lifecycle Management (PLM)                      IT BRM to Ensure the quality policy/system is planned, understood, implemented and maintained by ensuring compliance within the department                      IT BRM to Organize the coordination of activities with outside suppliers and consultants to ensure timely delivery of commitments.                          IT BRM to work with Global Information Services to identify new tools to improve current state.              Responsibilities       , includes, but not limited to the following:               o               Provide leadership, liaison, and continuity and be the bridge between IT and Business Units        (BUs).            o               Understand the business, manage complexities, negotiate, communicate, prioritize and meet the IT needs of MEIC            o               Ensure that BU projects align with the IT strategy and technology that best provides maximum return on investment            o               Assesses and communicates risks, issues and opportunities for BUs associated with IT investments            o               Be the single PoC for BUs, manage project intake process, evaluate and analyze project objectives, work for solution design, negotiate and resolve issues, Monitor-health and communicate appropriately            o               Manage relationships with BUs and all other stakeholders for successful start-to-finish delivery of the projects to BU satisfaction.            o               Ensure continuous delivery of IT Services to BUs through oversight of service level agreements            o               Understands business strategy and communicates to rest of IT to ensure alignment to business goals            o               Keep current with trends and issues in IT Industry, current technologies and prices            o               Creates culture of continuous improvement by identifying opportunities for operational efficiency and deploying enterprise best practices and employee engagement to improve cost, quality, delivery, employee and customer satisfaction            o               Determines critical skills within the organization/functional area and provides inputs for development plans and forecasts for staffing            Must Have: Minimum Requirements                           Bachelor s or Masters degree Engineering.                             More than 13 years of IT relevant industry experience in Service Delivery and Relationship Management with at least 5 years in leading professional teams in MNCs      in the stated domain of service delivery with demonstrated maturity and knowledge.               Must Have         IT BRM must have            o               Strong interpersonal skills, business acumen, ability to negotiate            o               Good Stake holder management            o               Networking            o               Organization understanding and demonstrated performance to stretch beyond convenient hours to negotiate business delivery            o               Solid analysis and IT design background in MNCs            o               Strong listening, persuading, influencing and shaping skills to communicate win-win scenarios, eliminate disconnects and work to resolve problems and offer meaningful alternatives.            o               Strategic Partnering and service shaping skills with demonstrated use of appropriate metrics to drive delivery and value            o               Skills for managing business relationship and influencing business practices            o               Strong communication skills. Excellent English oral and written communication skills            o               Customer service approach: Customer focused with strong customer service skills and the ability to apply sensitivity and discretion when required            o               Demonstrated Project Management approach            o               Strong sensitivity for cultural differences and significant global acumen.            o               Process orientation            o               Availability in case of urgent requirement after working hours            o               Dynamic, proactive and positive attitude, flexibility even in a stressful situation            o               High level of energy, enthusiasm and passion                  Nice to Have                                    Professional/technical certifications in Project Management is highly desirable.                             Management Degree is preferable

column2: Plus91 Technologies is looking for a Project Coordinator to be responsible for handling our company's ongoing projects. You will be working closely with your team members to ensure that all project requirements, deadlines, and schedules are on track. Responsibilities include submitting  project deliverables, preparing status reports, and establishing effective project communication plans as well as the proper execution of said plans . To be a successful candidate, you will need to have proven experience in project management and the ability to lead project teams of various sizes. A Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a huge advantage. Ultimately, the Project Coordinators duties are to ensure that all projects are completed on time, within budget and meet high quality standards     Key Responsibilities: - Work together with the Business Owner/ Stake Holder to plan and execute projects, and ensure that teams have appropriate product and technical specifications, direction, and resources to deliver products effectively by establishing realistic estimates for timelines while ensuring that projects remain on target to meet deadlines - Work closely with development, and quality control teams to get an estimation and plan of delivery - Report to Business Owners on project scheduling, project updates, delays, and resource allocation/availability, and any issue that may impact the risk and health of the business - Schedule and conduct release meetings and weekly demos of work-in-progress - Ensure that proper and thorough technical product documentation is captured and made available to the team - Coordinate release and sprint planning - Conduct daily scrum meetings  - Utilize efficient processes to ensure minimal resource wastage - Coordinate releases with marketing and support teams to ensure smooth product launches with proper information and resources available to customers - Assess all members of the engineering team and make recommendations related to resource utilization. - Establishing effective project communication plans and ensuring their execution. -Facilitating change requests to ensure that all parties are informed of the impacts on schedule and budget. -Coordinating the development of user manuals, training materials, and other documents as needed to enable successful implementation and turnover of the process or system to the clients. -Managing customer satisfaction within the project transition period.  Candidate Profile You Have: -  Must have at least 3 years of experience working through the design, development, release cycle and delivering software products to market but not greater than 10 years. - Strong understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC) - Strong project management skills, time management, and problem-solving skills - Experience with managing the development of SaaS and cloud-based applications preferred - Experience with Scrum methodology and Agile practices preferred - Experience with handling tools like JIRA, Trello, Asana etc - Ms-Office expertise - Atleast 2 years of experience in ERP, CRM, Healthcare sector project implementation. - A high command of verbal and written English & Hindi -  Readiness to travel to client location as per requiremen t     Awesome to have: - Self-motivation, team player, action and results-oriented - Well organized, good communication and reporting skills - Ability to successfully work under tight project deadlines - Previous experience working in Software Support will be an added advantage

column2: Job   Description: Project Lead   Job Summary: As the Project Lead at SDMS, you will assist our CTO in developing and implementing cutting-edge technology solutions that align with our mission and drive innovation in document management and workflow. You will play a crucial role in shaping our technology strategy, overseeing product development and ensuring the seamless integration of technology solutions into our offerings. A key requirement for this role is expertise in coding languages such as .NET, Java, and SQL. Experience: 10 years & above Desired Candidate Profile: Bachelor's degree in a relevant technical field (Master's or BE, MCA, ME preferred). Proven experience in a senior technology leadership role, with a track record of successful technology strategy development and execution. Strong technical background, with expertise in .NET, Java, SQL, and related technologies. Excellent leadership and team management skills. Exceptional problem-solving and decision-making abilities. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams and stakeholders. Knowledge of industry trends and emerging technologies. Strategic thinking and vision. Job Description: Technology Strategy : Develop and implement a comprehensive technology strategy that aligns with SDMS's mission and supports the growth of our Document Management solutions. Product Development : Lead the research, design, and development of innovative document management and workflow optimization products and solutions using coding languages like .NET, Java, and SQL. Team Leadership:  Recruit, train, mentor, and manage a high-performing technical team, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence. Technical Architecture:  Define and maintain the technical architecture, ensuring it supports scalability, security, and performance requirements. Coding Expertise:  Personally contribute to coding efforts, particularly in .NET, Java, and SQL, and provide technical guidance to the development team. Partnership Development:  Evaluate and establish strategic partnerships with technology vendors and industry stakeholders to drive innovation and stay at the forefront of document management trends. Budget Management:  Develop and manage the technology budget, ensuring cost-effective utilization of resources. Risk Management:  Identify and mitigate technology-related risks and vulnerabilities. Project Management:  Oversee project execution, ensuring timely delivery and quality outcomes. Communication:  Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate technology-related updates and strategies to the executive leadership. Cloud:  Experience in AWS, Azure is desirable Preferred Qualifications: Previous experience in the document management industry or related fields. column2: The Collaborative Lead will play a pivotal role in establishing and nurturing a robust network of partners, leading a mission-focused team, and driving the strategic vision of The Godavari Initiative. This critical role demands exceptional leadership and collaboration skills to foster partnerships between businesses, government agencies, and civil society organizations (CSOs).      You will play a lead role in driving the assessment, development and execution of a comprehensive action plan for the river basin, utilizing nature-based solutions (NBS) to achieve long-term sustainability.         Responsibilities               Research and Assessment:             Lead research and assessments to evaluate the health of the Godavari River basin.             Develop metrics and methodologies for monitoring and reporting on the project s impact and effectiveness.                     Network Building and Stakeholder Engagement             Partnership Development: Identify, engage, and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including governmental agencies, non-profits, community leaders, and private sector partners.             Collaborative Setup: Establish frameworks and forums for regular interaction and collaboration among stakeholders.                     Leadership and Team Management             Team Leadership: Lead, inspire, and mentor a multidisciplinary team committed to the initiative s mission and objectives.             Mission Alignment: Ensure all team activities align with the strategic goals and vision of The Godavari Initiative.                     Corporate Partnerships             Business Engagement: Develop and manage partnerships with corporate entities to support project goals through funding, resources, and expertise.             CSR Initiatives: Leverage corporate social responsibility (CSR) programs to advance the initiative s objectives.                     Government Liaisoning             Policy Advocacy: Advocate for policy changes and regulatory support that align with the initiative s sustainability goals.             Government Relations: Build and maintain strong relationships with government officials and agencies at local, state, and national levels.                     Strategy and Operations             Strategic Planning: Lead the development and implementation of strategic plans to guide the initiative s efforts and measure success.             Operational Model: Design and oversee the operational model for collaborative activities, ensuring efficient and effective project execution.             On-Ground Execution: Ensure effective and efficient execution of all on-ground activities             Resource Mobilization: Identify and secure funding and other resources to support the initiative s projects and sustainability.               Mandatory Qualification and Experience:                   Master s degree in Environmental Science, Sustainable Development, Public Policy, Business Administration, or a related field.             Minimum of 8 years experience in project management, stakeholder engagement, partnership development, and team leadership in sustainability and climate resilience.             Proven experience in creating and executing communication strategies.                     Additional Skills:                     Experience in leading multi-functional team, growth and partnership portfolio in past organizations, aptitude to handle multiple stakeholders.             Strong networking and relationship-building abilities.             Proven track record in corporate & government partnerships and resource mobilization.             Effective communication and public speaking skills.             Strategic thinking with experience in policy advocacy and government relations.             Knowledge of the Godavari River basins socio-economic and environmental context is a plus.
