column2: The WRI India Ross Centre for Sustainable Cities is seeking to fill a full-time position to advance city climate action planning work in Maharashtra. Maharashtra state is committed to support the transition of 43 million plus cities towards sustainable, resilient, and net-zero pathways to align with Government of India s net zero targets for 2070.    The selected candidate will lead this initiative at the state level addressing systemic gaps around capacity deficits, institutional and governance arrangements, projectization, and innovative financing. The selected candidate will lead the progress and implementation of the plan in terms of institutional and financial planning mechanisms. The individual will liaise with government departments, agencies, co-ordinate with local institutions and partners, and work closely with staff from WRI India and consortium partners.   WRI globally, has deep experience in the urban development sector and is widely recognized as a leader in promoting sustainable cities. Currently, WRI India is supporting various government and private agencies to promote low carbon climate resilient development in Indian cities, ensuring decarbonization that is just and inclusive .          How your day will unfold:        The selected candidate will support the Sustainable Cities program at WRI India with the following:   Lead relationships with city and State leadership, administrative heads, relevant line departments/ agencies/ parastatal organizations/ CSOs/ NGOs/ local media/ local research institutes in India for various deliverables under the project.   Lead the project team and coordinate project deliverables, laisse with relevant government agencies to obtain required data.   Provide thought leadership on embedded state-wide climate action work, share knowledge on internal and external platforms.   Lead, organize and conduct stakeholders consultations to invite inputs; participate in all external and/or internal meetings and stakeholders consultations from time to time and provide inputs, as necessary.   Strengthen partnerships with peer organizations, and partners working on the ground.   Frequently travel to project relevant cities across Maharashtra for all important milestone events during the process   Supervise / assist the research team working to develop subnational climate action strategies and data-driven pathways.Prepare technical reports for the assignment including data collection, conduct surveys, compilation, analysis and develop presentations.   Advocate for effective climate policies and regulations at the local and state levels.   Facilitate collaborative design of projects that address climate challenges and community priorities, working with municipal governments/government departments, engineers, and citizen groups.   Advocate for innovative approaches to mobilize urban climate finance.         Qualifications and Requirements we seek:        Post-graduate in the related field of urban planning, energy, environment, climate change, sustainable development, environmental economics, etc.   At least 10-15 years of sectoral experience in the field of climate change   Demonstrated experience of working with sub-national governments in India on climate change Credible knowledge of Maharashtra state policies, programs, and key stakeholders   Knowledge of relevant low-carbon policies and climate-resilient development in India   Demonstrated experience in leading and/or contributing to interdisciplinary research projects on climate action, policy analysis, data collection and surveys, and other related work   Strong communication skills, ability to liaise with government and other stakeholders - to collect data, communicate findings, and seek feedback iteratively   Proficiency in quantitative and/or qualitative data collection and analysis   Demonstrated ability to work both independently as well as part of a team   Ability to present complex information in a clear and concise manner   Ability to think creatively, work calmly and enthusiastically under pressure   Strong understanding of urban finance and climate finance architecture is a plus.    Marathi language proficiency is a requirement.

column2: Naukri E-hire is hiring for it's reputed client Project Manager with 10-15 yrs experience in Implementing PDM/PLM Solutions in Medium to Large Manufacturing Industries in India. Qualifications: BE/BTech ( Mechanical Engg.) Skill Set: PTC PDM / PLM Platforms, Integration to ERPs like Infor FP7 and SAP. PDM Link Business Administration: User and Group Management: The Project Manager oversees the creation, modification, and management of user accounts and groups within the PDM Link system. This includes assigning appropriate access levels and permissions based on user roles and responsibilities. Product and Library Contexts: They are responsible for creating and maintaining product and library contexts within PDM Link, ensuring accurate organization and classification of product data. Access Control Policies: The Project Manager defines and updates access control policies to regulate user access to sensitive data and system functionalities. Lifecycle and Workflows: They manage the configuration of lifecycle stages and workflows within PDM Link, facilitating the smooth progression of product development processes. Object Initialization Rules: They establish and refine object initialization rules to automate processes and ensure consistency in data entry and management. Parts Classification: Taxonomy Development: The Project Manager leads the development and refinement of parts classification taxonomy within PDM Link, defining categories, attributes, and relationships to facilitate effective data organization and retrieval. Attribute Mapping: They oversee the mapping of part attributes to standardized classifications, ensuring consistency and interoperability across product data. Data Governance: The Project Manager establishes data governance policies and procedures related to parts classification, ensuring data accuracy, completeness, and compliance with regulatory requirements. Integration with Product Data Management: They coordinate the integration of parts classification systems with PDM Link and other product data management tools, enabling seamless data exchange and synchronization. Training and Documentation: The Project Manager provides training and support to users on parts classification methodologies and tools and maintains comprehensive documentation to guide users in effectively leveraging classification systems.

column2: FED work streams are divided into three primary areas.          Research and Strategy:    Deep dive into identified sectors, speak to relevant stakeholders, study practices from other countries and build data backed evidence for change.            Communication and Outreach:    Build salience for opportunity in target sectors and need for reforms through op-eds in relevant channels, social media as well as one on one engagement with key bureaucrats and policymakers.            Implementation Support:    Work with select state governments in helping implement specific actions to promote the target sectors. The team is currently working closely with the UP Government on its Mission Trillion Dollar economy. The team is also working with Telangana and Tamil Nadu governments on their economic growth agenda.          Position Summary          We are looking to hire an exceptional Project Lead to join the team in an exciting time of organizational growth and development      The SPL will work on creating actionable plans, sharpening priorities, and ensuring delivery of high-quality outputs in a timely manner      The role will involve undertaking research and scoping exercises, establishing, and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders, creating organizational growth and strategy plans, and ensuring that the organization has the strategic support necessary to achieve its goals      Overall, the PL will provide project design and execution support, aligned with the missions, goals and targets of FED      This is a high-energy, entrepreneurial role and a great opportunity for those who enjoy working in a start-up environment and care deeply about economic growth and the impact sector      This role includes working with senior stakeholders and engaging with them on strategic projects that have the potential to solve key challenges of economic development in India      The FED team works with internal and external stakeholders on cross functional projects      The PL should have demonstrated capabilities in project, team and stakeholder management, as well as excellent oral & written communication skills      The ideal candidate is a self-starter with a bias towards action and the ability to work with ambiguous requirements          Key Responsibilities          Work with the leadership to execute work plans, with the aim of achieving the agreed targets and goals, in line with the budget.          Stakeholder mapping/ providing inputs into advocacy plans.          Work closely with the leadership team on creating and maintaining deep engagement with the government and private sector leaders.          Take on diverse operational tasks to ensure organizational success.          Prepare structured documents and other collaterals (including presentations, excel sheets etc.) as per the requirements for the project.          Prepare progress reports from time-to-time for internal and external reviews.          Project manage and coordinate with stakeholders concerned with various projects.          Analyze publicly available data/ information and provide relevant insights.          Required Qualifications, Skills, and Abilities:          Masters or equivalent degree, preferably in Economics, Public Policy, Business Administration, or Public Administration from a top tier institution.          6-10 years of experience; with at least two years in a managing project teams.          Exceptional analytic and technical skills.          High attention to detail, accuracy, protocol, and deadline.          Highly analytical thinker with sound business judgment.          Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder-facing skills including solid presentation and facilitation skills.          High level of flexibility and responsiveness with the ability to shift priorities quickly and as organizational demands require.          Proven self-starter (comfortable with what could be a remote team) with demonstrated problem solving and organizational skills.
column11: Business administration, Operations management, Project management, Analytical, Social media, Public administration, Research, Stakeholder management, Operations, Project design

column2: We are looking for an experienced technical Project Manager who will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and work with cross-functional teams to design, build and roll-out products that deliver the company?s vision and strategy     As a Project Manager, you will play a crucial role in overseeing the successful delivery of our mobile app, website, and custom software development projects     You will be responsible for managing the entire project lifecycle, from initiation to closure, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards     Your strong knowledge of both Agile and Waterfall methodologies, along with a deep understanding of the latest trends in the market, will enable you to make informed decisions and effectively lead your team     KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:     Develop comprehensive project plans, including scope, objectives, deliverables, timelines, and resource allocation. Execute projects using Agile or Waterfall methodologies, depending on project requirements, ensuring adherence to established processes and standards.     Collaborate closely with clients, internal teams, and third-party vendors to gather project requirements, establish clear communication channels, and manage expectations. Build and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, ensuring effective communication and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.     Lead and motivate cross-functional project teams, including developers, designers, quality assurance, and other stakeholders. Provide clear direction, set expectations, and foster a collaborative work environment. Effectively manage resources and resolve conflicts to ensure project success.     Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks and issues. Develop risk management plans and proactively monitor and control risks throughout the project lifecycle. Make informed decisions to minimize potential impacts on project timelines, budget, and quality.     Maintain clear and effective communication with clients, team members, and senior management. Provide regular project status updates, conduct project meetings, and prepare comprehensive project documentation and reports. Ensure all stakeholders are well-informed and aligned.     Ensure projects adhere to quality standards and meet client expectations. Develop and implement quality control processes, conduct regular reviews, and perform thorough testing to ensure the delivery of high-quality solutions.     Stay abreast of the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in mobile app development, website development, and custom software development. Leverage this knowledge to identify opportunities for improvement, drive innovation, and enhance project delivery processes.     Make timely and informed decisions based on project priorities, client needs, and business objectives. Evaluate risks and benefits, consult with stakeholders, and leverage your expertise to make effective decisions that drive project success.     WHAT WE LOOK FOR IN YOU:     Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field.     Proven experience 5 years as a Project Manager, preferably in a technology or software development company, with a focus on mobile apps, websites, and custom software development.     Strong knowledge of Agile and Waterfall methodologies, with the ability to adapt and apply the appropriate methodology based on project requirements.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate with clients, team members, and senior management. Strong negotiation and conflict resolution skills.     Proven track record of successfully delivering projects on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.     Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams to achieve project goals.     Exceptional decision-making skills, with the ability to make informed decisions under pressure and in complex situations.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.     Knowledge of the latest trends and technologies in mobile app development, website development, and custom software development.     PMP or Agile certifications are a plus.
column11: PMP, Quality standards, Team management, Conflict resolution, Analytical, Resource allocation, Agile, Risk management, Project delivery

column2: Job Description          Pramira is seeking a Project Coordinator based in India. The Project Coordinator will be responsible managing, coordinating, leading projects from initiation through delivery. He or she will be responsible for meeting the project requirements and managing project scope, quality, schedule, budget, resources, and risk. Serve as a liaison between all the cross functional teams.     Project coordinator responsibilities:       Facilitates and coordinates the work of one or more project teams during execution of large scale programs     Develops and updates detailed schedules in a database     Identifies and works to remove barriers to successful completion of the overall project     Facilitates decision making processes as appropriate, serving as liaison between project managers, and mediating disagreements on approach to tasks within the overall project     Provides timely project status updates to the delivery management team     Generates customized reports     Tracks contracts, purchase orders, submittals and completes project close-out packages     Tracks all major and minor milestones associated with end-to-end deployment activities     Performs miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned                     Qualifications        2+ years related administrative experience     Detail-oriented and organized     Strong communication and customer service skills     Solid understanding of MS Office

column2: We are looking for a young, passionate and dynamic professional to supervise and control all strategic and business aspects of the loyalty program. The candidate will be required to oversee all aspects of the program and responsible for its overall success to the management.       To thrive as a Program Lead, the candidate must be a prudent manager and an inspiring leader. The ideal candidate will have a business mindset and will be able to see the big picture in a variety of settings and take actions to enhance the programs success while keeping the human factor in perspective.           Responsibilities        Develop high quality business strategies and plans along with business partners ensuring their alignment with the programs short-term and long-term objectives     Provide strategic, financial and operational leadership for the program and closely work with the Management and senior leadership team      Build and lead a high performing managerial team      Oversee all operations and business activities to ensure they produce the desired results and are consistent with the overall strategy and mission     Make profound decisions to ensure financial success of the program     Enforce adherence to legal guidelines and in-house policies to maintain the programs legality and business ethics     Review financial and non-financial reports to devise solutions or improvements     Build trust relations with key partners and stakeholders and act as a point of contact for important stakeholders     Analyze problematic situations and provide solutions to ensure steady progress of the program     Maintain a deep knowledge of the markets and the industry               Candidate Profile/ Requirements        Proven experience in senior managerial position for 5-6 years     MBA in business administration or relevant field      Experience in managing coalition loyalty and engagement programs with P&L responsibility is a must      Experience in Food / Retail industry is preferable     Experience in developing profitable strategies and implementing vision     Strong understanding of corporate finance and performance management principles     Familiarity with diverse business functions such as Marketing, PR, Finance, HR etc.     Analytical abilities and problem-solving skills     Excellent communication and public speaking skills

column1: Lead SAP Lead - IT Projects Delivery
column2: About the role The IT Projects Delivery Lead is accountable for planning and managing the delivery of SAP and integrated systems projects to agreed scope, schedule and budget and in accordance with agreed methodologies and standards.? What you will be doing ?Leadership? 	Be the single point of contact for the project team and senior stakeholders in driving a project from initiation, delivery to handing over to the operational teams 	Work collaboratively with the business, technical, functional and architecture teams to manage project delivery 	Plan, manage and drive resources/tasks aligned to a program or project in accordance with the broader project management processes 	Negotiate and drive key decisions with a fact based approach 	Driving an inclusive culture in line with Orica Charter and Values with a focus on prioritising key areas as indicated through focus groups or internal assessment.? ?Stakeholder Management? 	Understand the objectives and requirements set by the program or project sponsor.? 	Establish and maintain a strong working relationship with the program or project sponsor, business teams and IT stakeholders.? 	Provide regular status updates through project steering committee meetings/ status update meetings aligned to the audience, including key risk, issue and decision points.? 	Work closely with the functional/technical consultants and solution architects to align solution which meet business outcomes and IT Strategy 	Strong skills in vendor management where external parties are involved as part of project delivery ?Program and Project Management? 	Understand the objectives and requirements of a specific IT program or project and plan the appropriate scope, schedule, budget and resourcing to deliver the program or project outcomes.? 	Adhere to IT PMO project management methodologies, standards and tools.? 	Manage programs and projects to agreed scope, schedule, budget and resourcing.? 	Raise and manage program and project risks, issues and scope changes in accordance with IT PMO processes and tools? 	Manage multiple projects/programs potentially with conflicting timeline and resource requirements ? What you bring ?? 	Understanding of SAP ecosystem in a project management capacity 	Ability to manage large complex projects/programs 	Understanding of logistics processes is desirable but not mandatory 	Tertiary qualified, preferably in an IT-related discipline.? 	10+ years of experience in an IT (SAP focused preferred) Project Management Role.? 	Understanding of Waterfall and Agile implementation approaches.?PMP certification preferred. 	Skills and experience of key project management disciplines, including management of scope, budget, schedule and resourcing.? 	Demonstrated experience in delivering enterprise-wide solutions across geographically diverse locations.? 	Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to communicate across all levels of an organisation.? 	Strong stakeholder-engagement and customer-facing skills and experience, with the ability to understand requirements, manage expectations and maintain strong working relationships.? 	Strong analytical, problem solving, decision making and negotiation skills.? ? What we offer ? 	The opportunities, facilities and environment associated with working in a global organisation; 	Flexible career paths and working arrangements; 	A?diverse and inclusive workplace where your unique abilities and talents will be recognised and encouraged; 	Programs, opportunities and initiatives to ensure your continued growth; 	Culture driven by key Orica values: Safety, Respect, Together, Integrity and Excellence 	Competitive salary packages.
column11: Project Management, PMO, SAP Project Management, Project Delivery, IT Project Management, Leadership Skills
